description:
Neko tries desperately to try to win Masamune`s affection. However, Masamune seems rather oblivious to this fact and when he gets home, he finds Yoshino and Neko there, making him food. Masamune panics because there are various things from his past that he doesn`t want to be seen...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attack! Battle of the Home Visits
Chargez ! La pagaille s`invite à la maison
